title: [Large-Scale] Blended Digital Education for Personal Tutor Competency Enhancement: Application in Social Learning Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of university-level personal tutoring concepts and basic awareness of educational systems
context.additional_context: A blended approach combining real-time lectures with self-directed digital learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Emphasizes instructional design considering learners' cultural diversity and social contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the educational policies, social structures, and learning procedures of private tutoring with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can practice effective communication strategies with tutees through three or more role-playing sessions, reflect on feedback, and enhance their ability to build educational relationships.
Learners can complete interactive activities in digital learning materials and apply problem-solving strategies to private tutoring cases involving individuals from diverse socioeconomic backgrounds.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
